Joypad

subrountines related to player inputs

Functions
readjoy

Subroutine from NesDev

Read the player input from joypad 1

Return
btn_1

Joypad 1 inputs (ABTSUDLR)

readjoy_safe

Subroutine from NesDev

Same as readjoy but is safe from DPCM conflict.

Return
btn_1

Joypad 1 inputs (ABTSUDLR)

update_input

Update the player input if the input timer has reached 0

Return
btn_1

Joypad 1 inputs (ABTSUDLR)
